name: Low poly Fox Lady
description:
A ultra low poly Fox lady, complete with a rig. 1242 faces, complete with its own texture and rigging.

Created using Blender 2.4, contains a Blend and an X file along with the textures used.

RIGHTS:

The Buyer is granted these rights:

The right to use it in both commercial and non-commercial projects.

The right to modify to their needs.

The Buyer does not have the right to resell or repackage the model, even modified, in a packet or collection.
